    • Uses of Surface3D in surfaces

      Subclasses of Surface3D in surfaces 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FVPolygonMesh
      Face-Vertex polygon Mesh which extends the abstract PolygonMesh class.
      class  NURBS
      This class represents NURBS surfaces in 3D space.
      class  ParametricSurface3D
      Abstract extension of the Surface3D class which is used for parametric surfaces.
      class  PolygonMesh
      Abstract class which is needed for all of the different Polygon Meshes.
      class  Spiral
      Creates a parametric surface with the mathematical functions of a spiral.
      class  Tetrahedron
      Creates tetrahedron objects containing 4 points.
      class  Torus
      Creates a parametric surface with the mathematical functions of a Torus.
      class  Triangle3D
      Creates 3D triangle objects which consist out of 3 points.
      Methods in surfaces with parameters of type Surface3D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void SurfaceUtilities.rotateX(Surface3D s, double phi)
      Rotates the model around the x-axis.
      static void SurfaceUtilities.rotateY(Surface3D s, double phi)
      Rotates the model around the y-axis.
      static void SurfaceUtilities.rotateZ(Surface3D s, double phi)
      Rotates the model around the z-axis.
      static void SurfaceUtilities.translateX(Surface3D s, double delta)
      Translate the model over the x-axis.
      static void SurfaceUtilities.translateY(Surface3D s, double delta)
      Translate the model over the y-axis.
      static void SurfaceUtilities.translateZ(Surface3D s, double delta)
      Translate the model over the z-axis.
